blog.name: avengers-familyimagines
blog.title: Avengers Family Imagines
blog.description: I write platonic and romantic imagines and fics! involving the Avengers and other Marvel characters. Feel free to request something! Just as a heads up, Imagines I write are small things that are short and sweet and aren’t very descriptive while my Fics are more detailed and story-like.

summary:
In the soul stone
Peter: i’m gonna be honest its not so bad here
Shuri: really?
Peter: yeah, i-
Wade: PETER! PETER! HEY...

blog.name: fictional-downey
blog.title: Fictional Downey
blog.description: Hi! Welcome to my Robert Downey Jr. fanfiction blog! I'm a HUGE fan of RDJ (and not just since he took on the role of Iron Man I've loved him for YEARS). Yes, I know there is TONS of fanfiction out there and mine isn't anything special, but I'm posting anyway ;-). I'll post chapter by chapter, BUT also have all the finished chapters posted under the "The Stories" link below. Feedback is appreciated - even POLITE criticism. Have fun (and yes, there are ADULT chapters)!

summary: Once upon a time, Robert’s face used to appear on promotional items...alas, that time has long passed. He’s not even on popcorn...

blog.name: kakushimiko
blog.title: Kakushi Miko is my name
blog.description:
Hello everybody who is a fan of Tony Stark.
It's been a few years since I got this tumblr account and I still love Tony Stark with all my heart, so let's keep going like this 😎👍

summary: Currently watching Iron man 2, and loving it 😎👍 I admit it, is not the best movie, but I still love how Tony calls the congress...
body:
IRON MAN 2 BABY!

Currently watching Iron man 2, and loving it 😎👍 I admit it, is not the best movie, but I still love how Tony calls the congress men assclows 🤣 and to think that that little boy with the Iron man mask was Peter all along… 🤗

Ps, so what was the new element that runs the ark reactor? Vibranium or so kind of tesseract/reality stone element??? That’s another mistery that was never reveled 🤔

title: Basically... Run
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2KhOFMa

by twyly56

Since Infinity War is basically just like one big crossover fic, where the heck is the Doctor?

The Doctor just wants to take his dimension hopping wife out on a date. Their first real date actually. It’s rather difficult to get River Song in one place long enough to do so. He had everything planned out. Unfortunately for him, that is also the day Thanos tries to kill everyone.

In which the Doctor shows up and puts an end to the Giant Purple Grape’s nonsense.

Words: 1070, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Doctor Who
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences

  • Additional Tags: Thanos (Marvel) Dies, The Doctor (Doctor Who) Saves the Day, The Doctor isn’t Just a Cuddly Puppy, He’s a Badass Time Lord, Quote: Good Men Don’t Need Rules, Angry Doctor (Doctor Who), The Doctor (Doctor Who) Loves Their Wife, Married Couple, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, BAMF Doctor (Doctor Who), Minor Tony Stark/Stephen Strange, Precious Peter Parker, Life After the Evil Grape, I Am Groot (Marvel), Other Additional Tags to Be Added
